data.title: Rock On The Net: 41st Annual Grammy Awards
data.text:
Album of the Year

Lauryn HillThe Miseducation Of Lauryn Hill

iTunesAmazon.mp3 other nominees:Sheryl Crow - The Globe SessionsGarbage - Version 2.0Madonna - Ray Of LightShania Twain - Come On Over Record of the Year
